item.title: New Container: Obsidian
item.description: We have released a new container for Obsidian! Obsidian is a note-taking app that lets you create, link, and organize your notes on your device, with hundreds of plugins and themes to customize your workflow.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Obsidian!

Obsidian is a note-taking app that lets you create, link, and organize your notes on your device, with hundreds of plugins and themes to customize your workflow.
